keyPolicies.policyDescription: Boost police numbers in Greater London by 612. Scrape the ID card scheme and put the £575 million saved into more local police instead.
Paid for by cutting tax loopholes and making the super rich pay for it.
Getting the economy growing again with fair taxes, creating jobs, and promoting eco-friendly homes with cash back for green improvements.
Borough would see extra £23 million for local schools. A fair start for every child with smaller classes, more teachers and better discipline.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour caused the crash, Tories would wreck the recovery

issues.economy: Labour allowed the bankers to smash our economy. Tories would wreck the recovery. Lib Dems will get the economy growing again.
issues.education: Borough would see extra £23 million for local schools. We need a fair start for every child. Raise funding levels to those of private schools, smaller classes, more teachers and better discipline.
issues.environment: Promote eco-friendly homes with cash back for green improvements.
